descriptionHtml:
================================================
Categorized Favorites Menu Russian v0.1.15.2 (15 Aug, 2012)
Categorized Favorites Menu v0.1.15 (6 Jun, 2012)
================================================

[b]Change log[/b]
*0.1.15.2
Fixed \"Yasnovidenie\" and \"Maliy obereg\" not showing at right list  
Added Dawnguard support (English and partly Russian fan translation)  
Added \"Vampire\" abilities to shouts/talents list (incl. Brehanin\'s mod support)  

*0.1.15.1 
- Added Windows-1251 keywords and titles. 
- Removed \"fix_russian = true\"
- Added \"crossbow\" to weapon list
- Slightly changed menu position and lists size.

It seems that after 1.7 update CFM stopped working for some people. 
Temporary fix for your config: delete the string \"fix_russian = true\", because that fix doesn\'t work anymore and breaks CFM filter. In order to make your config work again, you need to convert all Russian keywords and titles into Windows-1251. 
Notes:
- Ctrl+[Arrows] doesn\'t work anymore for changing menu position. Use Favoritesmenu_overrides.cfg
- After editing Favoritesmenu.cfg you need restart the game
- You don\'t need update translation if your CFM works fine. Use 0.1.11.01.

*0.1.11.01 - Added \"Flame Cloak\" (Ogneniy Plash) to Destruction sublist. (thx to alex_red). Added \"axe\" to Weapon list.
[u]UPD:[/u] translation 0.1.11.01 works with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862]0.1.11.2[/url] v of CFM


================================================
Description
================================================

Mod Categorized Favorites Menu replace favorites menu with much more convenient lists with subcategories.

Recommended resolution - 1024x768.

[b]Control keys:[/b]

[list]
[*] Ctrl+W/S/right/left  --- move menu up/down/right/left 5 pixels
[*] Ctrl + f: Create an equipset from the currently equipped items.
[i]/* work strange with russian language, edit a favoritesmenu_equipsets.cfg[/i]
[*]  Ctrl + delete: --- Delete the selected equipset.
[*] Mouse wheel: scroll list
[*] Alt + mouse wheel: scroll list faster
[*] Ctrl + mouse wheel: switch lists
[/list]

[b]Russian Fix[/b]

Add at [config] section:
fix_russian = true

================================================
Update from/to 
================================================

Update to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862]0.1.11.2 CFM[/url] version: .cfg has not changed

For update from 0.1.10 your .cfg:
just copy your old .cfg to Interface folder, nothing has been changed. if your menu \"fly away\" or look strange you may need to reload game and open/close favorites menu several times. (It works for me so far).

For update from 0.1.8:
Add yo your cfg two lines:
equipset_create_key = 70
auto_favorite_prefix = (A) 
================================================
Russian Help (translated by MissNet)
================================================

[url=http://randomshit.ru/sortable/categorized_favorites_menu_config_guide_RU.html]Read[/url]

You can see RU_categorized_favorites_menu_config_guide.html in Skyrim/Data
================================================
Translation Fixes
================================================

Version 0.1.11.Ru - fix works, though you may need to reload a game, after SKSE update.
Version 0.1.8.Ru.2 - fix included
Version 1.4 - there is no Fix for russian language

================================================
Installation
================================================

!ATTENTION!
If you edit favoritesmenu.cfg file, don\'t forget to back up your .cfg files before update the mod.

Use NNM - easy.

Download manually and copy folder [Interface] and [SKSE] to Skyrim/Data folder.

in categorized_favorites_menu_sample_configs folder you can see custom configs translated into Russian with screenshots. Rename config you like and put it in Data/Interface folder. 
================================================
Uninstallation
================================================

Use NNM - super easy
Or delete favoritesmenu.swf and favoritesmenu.cfg from Data/interface
and CFM_extensions.dll, auto_favorites.dll and auto_favorites.cfg from SKSE/Plugins folder.

================================================
Compatible with
================================================
[list]
[*]SkyUI
[*]QD Inventory
[*] Better Sorting mod (you need to edit .cfg)
[/list]

Translation compatible with Steam russian language

================================================
Bugs
================================================

In russain language equipsets can be created only by editing favoritesmenu_equipsets.cfg manually. 
Some bags may occur if you unequip two handed weapons through Set menu.

if you want to disable Set menu completely, find equipset list in .cfg and change
enable = true
to
enable = false

================================================
Links
================================================

Mod Categorized Favorites Menu:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5613]Russian Fix[/url] developed by V10 (implemented)
author: Lamoed and MissNet
